verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَبَّتْ يَد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَبِى لَهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14669'>بٍ و</tajweed>َتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>َّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tabbat yadā abī lahabiw wa tabb(a).
verses.translation: Проклятие рукам Абу Ляхаба! И сам он - будь он проклят

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَمَا كَسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>َ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā agnā 'anhu māluhū wa mā kasab(a).
verses.translation: Ему богатство не поможет, Добро накопленное не спасет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14670'>رًا ذ</tajweed>َاتَ لَهَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ

وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرَأَتُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> حَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َالَةَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14671'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَطَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: И будет проклята его жена - Носительница дров

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى جِيدِهَا حَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14672'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14673'>لٌ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14674'>ِن م</tajweed>َّسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِۭ
verses.translation: Чью шею обовьет крученый жгут Из пальмовых волокон
